title: 50.5 in Fiberglass Long Handle 14-Gauge Steel Square Point Shovel
description: The 14-Gauge Square Point Open Back Shovel with Fiberglass Long Handle is the ideal shovel built to endure your home and work projects. With its specially reworked fiberglass handle and strong design, this shovel provides the durability you need for whatever project comes your way. The tool comes with a limited lifetime warranty. Founded in 1994, Bully Tools manufactures gardening and farm tools, shingle removers, floor scrapers, forestry and other specialty tools. With an unprecedented history of quality, Bully Tools is committed to applying the same reliability to our business practices. Bully Tools continues to grow and adapt to meet the ever changing needs of the economy and their consumers.
